alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 6:59PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pinellas County through 730 PM EDT... At 659 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over St. Pete Beach, or over Saint Petersburg. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Largo, Pinellas Park, Seminole, Downtown Saint Petersburg, Fort Desoto Park, Saint Petersburg, St. Petersburg, St. Pete Beach, Bay Pines, South Highpoint, Tierra Verde, Macdill Air Force Base, Gandy, Feather Sound, West And East Lealman, Ridgecrest, Safety Harbor and Gulfport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
